org.apache.spark.ml.util

Class MLWriter

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.util.MLWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossValidatorModel.CrossValidatorModelWriter, GeneralMLWriter, TrainValidationSplitModel.TrainValidationSplitModelWriter

    public abstract class MLWriter
extends Object
implements Logging
    Abstract class for utility classes that can save ML instances in Spark's internal format.

        public MLWriter option(String key,
                       String value)
